Author: thefakemexoxo
Text: What kinda scale do you have. It could need new batteries. It could be on a slightly uneven surface (I hear a piece of cat kibble under one of the feet of mine the other day and it threw it off by about 5lbs).

Author: PMmeUrFavoriteSongs
Text: It can definitely be water weight. Also, scales are not always perfect devices. Sometimes they can be slightly off balance and record things incorrectly.
